text: were a Japanese band from Tokyo. The members were Funky Kato Monkichi and DJ Kemikaru. They first appeared in 2004. They broke up in June 2013. == Famous songs == *"Lovin' Life" *"Sakura" Category:Musical groups from Tokyo Category:Musical groups established in 2004 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2013
title: Funky Monkey Babys
